story:
Once upon a time, in the ancient land of Iraq, there lived a young girl named Layla. Layla had the most curious mind and the biggest heart in all the land. Every night, before she went to bed, her father would tell her the most wonderful stories that would take her on magical adventures.

One evening, as Layla snuggled up in her bed, her father began to tell her a story about a brave little bird named Zara. Zara was a tiny sparrow who lived in a beautiful garden filled with colorful flowers and sweet fruits. Every day, Zara would fly around the garden, singing the most soothing melodies that brought joy and happiness to all who heard her.

One day, a powerful storm swept through the garden, destroying everything in its path. Zara knew she had to do something to help her beloved garden and its inhabitants. So, she bravely flew into the heart of the storm, using her soft feathers to shield the fragile plants and animals from harm.

Despite the fierce winds and pounding rain, Zara's courage and selflessness never wavered. She continued to protect the garden until the storm finally passed. When the sun emerged once again, the garden was even more beautiful than before, thanks to Zara's bravery and kindness.

As her father finished the story, Layla's eyes were filled with wonder and admiration for the little sparrow who had shown such incredible strength and compassion. She hugged her father tightly and thanked him for sharing such a heartwarming tale.

With a smile on her face and dreams of flying with Zara in her heart, Layla drifted off to sleep, feeling safe and loved in her father's arms, ready for her own adventures in dreamland.

And so, dear father, may this story inspire your daughter to be as brave, kind, and compassionate as little Zara, always ready to face challenges with a generous heart and a fearless spirit. Goodnight, Layla, sweet dreams.
